title: NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Pharmacist and Multipurpose Health Worker Posts
description: National Ayush Mission Kerala (NAM) has announced the official notification care 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Pharmacist and Multipurpose Health Worker Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Pharm, ANM can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last ...
